description:
After Jessie, James and Meowth interupted Katrina`s battle with Ash a movie director called Cleavon Schpielbunk wanted her Raichu and Ash`s Pikachu to audition for his movie.
Raichu made it through the iniial dancing round but after Raichu saw how Wigglytuff treated it co-stars, Raichu decided to walk off the stage leaving Psyduck to get the starring role.
name: Raichuu (Katsuko)
